DownloadComponent should correctly identify if the token is not expired

AutorizeGuardService canActivate should redirect to login if jwtToken and cookie token are empty
AutorizeGuardService canActivate should redirect to login if token is expired

AutorizeGuardService canActivate should redirect to login if any other case or error

GoogleSsoService signOut should sign out the user and navigate to accueil if token exists
GoogleSsoService signOut should do nothing if no token exists

AdminAutorizeGuardService should be created

AdminAutorizeGuardService canActivate should return true if role is ADMIN
